name: Flying High
overview:
A two game pack containing Euroblaster and a 32-bit version of Joust.

Euroblaster is a Space Invaders variant. The object of the game is to destroy every alien which appears on the screen. These appear in various shapes and sizes and in formation patterns, and it's your job to wipe them out. When all the aliens have been destroyed the next level will begin.

In Joust, players take control of a knight with a lance who rides a flying ostrich (stork, for Player 2) to do battle against computer-controlled knights who ride atop vultures.
